msgSnippet: Are you trying to use the gui interface if so try the textui first. A shot from the hip is it looks like junit wants a resource bundle for the U.S. but maybe

Are you trying to use the gui interface if so try the textui first.

A shot from the hip is it looks like junit wants a resource bundle for the U.S. but maybe your
set up for the U.K.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ajith Ittan [mailto:ajith_ittan@...]
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 9:58 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] DOubt in installation


Hi All,
I am getting this exception can neone please give me
the solution to this!!
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find
resource for base name cactus, locale en_US
	at
java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:423)
	at
java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:339)
	at
org.apache.commons.cactus.client.AbstractHttpClient.<clinit>(AbstractHttpClient.java:82)
	at
org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:281)

please revert back at the earliest.
Thanks & Regards
Ajith Ittan
